francisco v1.3.1 About Documentation Features

Features

Mobile minded

Media queries and fully responsive elements make for a fluid and seamless mobile browsing experience that works effectively on screens of all sizes.

Lightweight

This framework is designed to be a minimal starting point for your web projects. At just 2kb total, francisco makes a neglible impact on load speed.

Understandable

You won't need a billion and a half classes to identify your page elements. Simple and natural tag attribution makes coding a breeze — you won't have to refer to the docs very often.

Specific

Nested selectors make for predictable specificity and easy conditional formatting. It's pretty unlikely that your custom css will react in an unpredictable manner.

Customizable

You can very easily modify the framework to achieve your teams' end goal — there's not very much css to dig through!

Reusable

Simple documentation and design makes it easy to apply francisco's target style with precision and consistency.
